channel.title: Adding option's to objects?
channel.description: ok i was wondering if i can somehow add an option to an object like for example you have a rope and you can add "climb Up" or a stairs "climb down" or something like that? i know most of the object already have those but can i add an option to and object that dosen't have one.

item.title: Adding option's to objects?
item.dc:creator: @bl00dpk bl00dpk
item.description:
@bl00dpk wrote:

i know how to add it to items, and npc’s but not sure how to add them to object’s. for example for items you modify your ints for the option.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding option's to objects?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

bl00dpk:

ok i was wondering if i can somehow add an option to an object like for example you have a rope and you can add “climb Up” or a stairs “climb down” or something like that? i know most of the object already have those but can i add an option to and object that dosen’t have one.

Either through the cache or hardcoding it. The former is preferred.

Read full topic
